txt.en: Someone evil has stirred the Stone-trolls, rousing them to wreak havoc upon the fair glades of Meluinen.
You have discovered the Etten Caves at Taur Gonwaith. Whatever has stirred the trolls surely hides within these vast caverns.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: A fellowship is recommended for this quest.</rgb>

Angmar's emissary must reside deep within the cave in Taur Gonwaith, south-east of Lin Giliath.

You should defeat the emissary of Angmar that has gained the allegiance of the Stone-trolls.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: A fellowship is recommended for this quest.</rgb>

'You have earned more thanks than I have to give, [placeholder], for defeating the troll-keeper of Angmar.\n\n'Lachenn would have been pleased to know you. I name you Elf-friend and will not forget what you have done here, [placeholder]. I expect the Stone-trolls are not likely to forget either. Lin Giliath may have peace for a time.'
Search the Etten Caves for the leader of the trolls

Thaliollang is at Lin Giliath, north-west of Taur Gonwaith.\n\nThaliollang will be pleased to know that he was correct in his belief: there was an emissary from Angmar among the trolls. To the benefit of all, you have defeated him.
'Deep inside the caves of Taur Gonwaith, some emissary from Angmar has gained the allegiance of the Stone-trolls and is using them to do the work of Angmar in Meluinen. They must be stopped.'
'Lachenn has been avenged, and the Stone-trolls may never again attack Lin Giliath.'
'That Angmar should already have power even in Meluinen is a sad tiding.'
Seek out and defeat the Angmarim Troll-keeper
'Cross the Downs with caution, [placeholder], for the dangers increase with each passing day.'

Angmar's emissary must reside deep within the cave in Taur Gonwaith, south-east of Lin Giliath.

You should defeat the emissary of Angmar that has gained the allegiance of the Stone-trolls.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: A fellowship is recommended for this quest.</rgb>
